password.title: Admin password
password.placeholder: Provide device password if device is protected

hostname.title: Device hostname
hostname.placeholder: Device network name or IP address

interface.title: Interface
interface.placeholder: The network interface to use. If none is specified, all available interfaces will be used.

requestTimeout.title: Request timeout
requestTimeout.placeholder: The time, in seconds, to wait for a response before a request is aborted.

pingInterval.title: Ping interval
pingInterval.placeholder: The interval, in seconds, at which ping requests should be made to verify that the connection is open. Set to 0 to disable.

reconnectInterval.title: Reconnect interval
reconnectInterval.placeholder: The interval, in seconds, at which a connection attempt should be made after a socket has been closed.

texts.aboutMdns: Configure how the plugin discovers Shelly devices on your local network using Multicast DNS (mDNS). This enables automatic detection without needing to manually enter IP addresses.
texts.aboutWebsockets: Manage WebSocket connection parameters for Shelly devices. These settings control communication stability, request handling, and reconnection behavior.
